data.name: Aisling for Boobs 'em up
data.detailed_description:
Aisling is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Bolsward, Netherlands Aisling has Czechoslovakian, French and Seminole heritage. Aisling and her family relocated to Amsterdam when she was 10 years old due to her father’s career as an undercover DEA agent and patrolman. Aisling has always been a hardworking individual whose first job was as a server in Taco Bell when she was 14.

Aisling is also an incredibly creative person who exhibited impeccable writing skills as a child. Aisling is also a classically trained pianist and an honors art student. Aisling originally intended to become a school teacher and she graduated from college when she was just 18 years old. Aisling started teaching grades 4,5 and 6 (ages 9-12) and she worked as a school teacher for three years prior to making her porn debut. However, although she enjoyed teaching, Aisling could not ignore her exhibitionist nature so she decided to pursue a modeling career in the spring of 2000.

And at the same time she started to add tattoos on her body. Aisling was always fascinated with the bodyart and after she added her first tattoo on her neck she couldn't stop. Now her foots, arms and body side are inked with the amazing drawings and Aisling wants to add something more.

Aisling loves try new things and now she want to try herself as a prostitute.

Help Aisling to take her place on the street!

data.short_description: Aisling is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
